ui_design_styles.name: Material Design
ui_design_styles.description: Google's design language that uses grid-based layouts, responsive animations, transitions, padding, and depth effects such as lighting and shadows.

used_in.description: Post-purchase upsell email using Material Design with elevation and shadows, bold blue accent colors (#1976d2), typography hierarchy, grid-based product layout, and depth effects for product cards

Subject lines and preheaders examples page using Material Design with elevation and shadows, bold blue accent colors (#1976d2), typography hierarchy, grid-based layout, Arial font family, and depth effects for cards

ui_design_styles.name: Flat Design
ui_design_styles.description: A minimalist design approach that emphasizes usability and features clean, open space, crisp edges, bright colors, and two-dimensional illustrations.

used_in.description: Product launch email for gemstone collection using flat design with clean borders, bold colors, and minimal elements

ui_design_styles.name: Glassmorphism
ui_design_styles.description: A modern UI trend featuring translucent, frosted glass-like elements with subtle borders and background blur effects.

used_in.description: Customer reactivation email using glassmorphism with translucent backgrounds, light borders, and multi-layered glass effects

ui_design_styles.name: Neumorphism
ui_design_styles.description: A soft UI design style that creates a sense of depth through subtle shadows and highlights, making elements appear extruded from the background.

used_in.description: Abandoned cart email using neumorphism design with soft shadows, subtle highlights, low contrast gray color scheme, and embossed appearance for product cards and buttons

ui_design_styles.name: Skeuomorphic Design
ui_design_styles.description: A design approach that mimics real-world objects and textures, making digital interfaces resemble their physical counterparts.

used_in.description: Informative email showcasing premium end tables collection using skeuomorphic design with realistic textures, 3D effects, detailed shadows, gradient backgrounds, and embossed button styles to create depth and dimension

ui_design_styles.name: Brutalism
ui_design_styles.description: A bold, raw design style characterized by stark contrasts, bold typography, and an unpolished, raw aesthetic that prioritizes function over form.

ui_design_styles.name: Minimalism
ui_design_styles.description: A design philosophy that focuses on simplicity, using only essential elements and removing unnecessary decorations to create clean, focused interfaces.

used_in.description: Welcome email with discount code using minimalism design with clean white space, simple typography, limited black and white color palette, and essential elements only

ui_design_styles.name: Dark Mode UI
ui_design_styles.description: A design style featuring dark color schemes that reduce eye strain in low-light conditions and conserve battery on OLED displays.

ui_design_styles.name: Card-Based Design
ui_design_styles.description: A layout approach that organizes content into distinct card containers, making information digestible and scannable.

used_in.description: Responsive email template for men's shoes Black Friday sale using card-based product layout

ui_design_styles.name: Gradient Design
ui_design_styles.description: A vibrant design style that uses color gradients to create depth, visual interest, and modern aesthetics with smooth color transitions.

used_in.description: Used gradient backgrounds in header banner and CTA button for vibrant Black Friday theme
